verses.name: Luke 11:14
verses.text: And he was casting out a devil, and it was dumb. And it came to pass, when the devil was gone out, the dumb spake; and the people wondered.

verses.name: Luke 11:15
verses.text: But some of them said, He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils.

verses.name: Luke 11:16
verses.text: And others, tempting him, sought of him a sign from heaven.

verses.name: Luke 11:17
verses.text: But he, knowing their thoughts, said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and a house divided against a house falleth.
